schedule: Campo dos Afonsos - Campo dos Afonsos
circumstances:
Shortly after takeoff from Campo dos Afonsos AFB, while climbing, the aircraft lost height and crashed. The airplane was destroyed and all three crew members were killed. 
Crew:
Cpt Atila Silveira de Oliveira, 
Cpt Salustiano Franklin da Silva,
Lt Thomaz Menna Barreto Monclaro.
